channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - July 31, 2020
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-july-31-2020) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* *Apocalypse Keys* * *Apocalypse World Burned Over* * *Beam Saber* * *Blades in the Dark* * *Brindlewood Bay* * *Checkpoint Midnight* * *Don't Rest Your Saber* * *Doomsday Defiant: Our Dystopia* * *Get Ready 2 Rock* * *Hearts of Wulin* * *Mage: Powered by the Dark* * *Masks: A New Generation* * *Night's Dark Operators* * *Poison'd* * *Révolution* * *Rust Hulks* * *Scum and Villainy* * *Spire* * *The Bat Hack* * *Ultraviolet Grasslands*, and * *Under Hollow Hills*
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Hangouts category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-hangouts) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/) to play!

item.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - July 31, 2020
item.dc:creator: @flatvurm
item.description:
@flatvurm wrote:

Greetings, all! This week’s Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we’ve got sessions of these great games:

  • Apocalypse Keys
  • Apocalypse World Burned Over
  • Beam Saber
  • Blades in the Dark
  • Brindlewood Bay
  • Checkpoint Midnight
  • Don’t Rest Your Saber
  • Doomsday Defiant: Our Dystopia
  • Get Ready 2 Rock
  • Hearts of Wulin
  • Mage: Powered by the Dark
  • Masks: A New Generation
  • Night’s Dark Operators
  • Poison’d
  • Révolution
  • Rust Hulks
  • Scum and Villainy
  • Spire
  • The Bat Hack
  • Ultraviolet Grasslands, and
  • Under Hollow Hills

Thanks go out to all this week’s facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the Gauntlet Hangouts category on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar to play!
